node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `mail` ( `mail_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `from_address` char(80) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `attachment_file` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`mail_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
